ygData.subject: Re: Hunting the new Hate - Minor Spoiler!
ygData.msgSnippet: Gaelthorne, Since you seem to have apparently logged much more post-patch Hate time than I have, maybe you can shine some light on a few questions i ve been
ygData.messageBody:
Gaelthorne,

Since you seem to have apparently logged much more post-patch Hate time
than I have, maybe you can shine some light on a few questions i've been
having.
1, Now that you have the basic stuff down, roughly how long does Hate take
to clear now? I remember per patch people used to do planes in about 4 - 8
or so hours, baring problems. Due to pathing and such now, im curious how
much longer poh will take on average.
2. Have you come to a conclusion what the spawn time on the 2nd floor mobs
are? 12hrs same as level 1? Mini-bosses 24? less? more?
3. Have you found a trash can to store all those ceramonial robes? :)

Thanks in advance.
Lomack
